builds.strategy: This is the most defensive Aurena build possible. Stand near allies absorbing hits. Every hit triggers Reflex (120% Cold + 40 Armor) automatically. Flexibility splits 37% of all incoming damage over 4 seconds while Mass Cleanse is on cooldown, smoothing burst damage. Snow provides passive barrier and fires cold snowballs. All healing from Clemency leech, Voracity, Rejuvenation, and Wicked Vitality converts to cold damage through Glacial Core (25pt synergy with Clemency). Frost adds cold damage equal to 10% max HP and permanently increases your HP pool (18pt with Glacial Core). Bleakness adds 50% damage to cold-slowed enemies - always active since everything you do applies cold. Protection adds 40 Armor and Unstoppable. Circulating Life shares 40% of your healing with allies. The build heals allies, applies cold to enemies, and retaliates automatically.
strengths: Extremely hard to kill with Flexibility + Protection + Reflex + Snow
25pt Glacial Core + Clemency healing-to-cold loop
18pt Glacial Core + Frost infinite HP scaling
120% Cold retaliation through Reflex (underused essence)
37% damage smoothing through Flexibility (underused essence)
50% damage bonus to cold-slowed enemies always active
40% healing shared with allies via Circulating Life
weaknesses: Lower active damage than offensive builds
Requires allies to maximize support value
